subject: Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: BALTIMORE, March 3 (AP) — Four elite college lacrosse teams drew the largest crowd to watch a regular-season match Saturday, when 20,180 attended a season-opening doubleheader at M&T Bank Stadium, the home of the N.F.L.’s Ravens.
